channel.title: Could I Take SurfPin To Court?!
channel.description:
For those of you who do not know who or what SurfPin is, it is the way to get RuneScape membership over the phone.
Ok, now look at this: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/7280/sure2wo7.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img310.imageshack.us/img310/2711/sure3dh9.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img67.imageshack.us/img67/5876/surede5.jpg[/img][/URL]
All clearly showing they charge Â£4.50.
Now, I decided, seeing as they hd done this before, I'd try and catch them out. I took a picture of my phone credit before I made the call. I then recorded the call. It lasted me only 2:50 minutes out of the 3:10 it was supposed to. I never got my pin. My credit before the call was Â£5 and I have proof of how long the call took and my credit before the call. Of course, I'm not planning to take them to court lol but do I have anything?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 10:36:31 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Could I Take SurfPin To Court?!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Pie 0wnz, post:7, topic:9850”][quote author=boberick link=topic=14242.msg161848#msg161848 date=1155833515]
i like melted cheese and ham.
[/quote]
Fuck off.

Chris, you could, but this could invalve jagex and could expose us :o![/quote]
Be careful…
No breaking of rules.

Read full topic
item.source: Could I Take SurfPin To Court?!

item.title: Could I Take SurfPin To Court?!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Well, they wouldn’t give me a pin but they offered me Â£5 and another Â£10 as a gesture of good will Looks like they really slipped up

item.title: Could I Take SurfPin To Court?!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’m recieving my money back because I threatened to take them to court. I’m trying to squeeze more out of them. I’ll let you know of their reply.
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 18, 2006, 08:18:26 AM[/size][hr]Cmon - I think I made a break through!
